title: Deshaun Watson's 11-Game Suspension
description:
Nora and Lindsay share their thoughts on the news that Deshaun Watson has now been suspended for 11 games and fined $5 million. They discuss Watson’s punishment, Watson and members of the Browns organization's press conferences, and more.

Hosts: Nora Princiotti and Lindsay Jones
Associate Producer: Isaiah Blakely
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
